channel.title: How to create 8-bit lead with bass and bell
channel.description:
Wanna more 8-bit sounds so I created it in one of my projects "Colorfull" and it was unexpected.I was creating something different in music section and boom! 8 bit sound and bell!!!
Here's the project: https://app.auxy.co/projects/LSV9a123nZO_CC93Ew-zgg==
Follow the instructions...
